placeholderImages.description: A screenshot of the app's services screen, where a user is booking a car wash for a black car.
A screenshot of the app's main dashboard showing an overview of upcoming appointments and car status.
A screenshot of the service selection screen, where users can choose from various car wash and detailing packages.
A screenshot of the booking calendar, allowing users to select a convenient date and time for their service.
A screenshot of the payment screen, showing a secure and easy way to pay for services within the app.
A screenshot of the appointment location screen, where users can enter their address for the mobile service.
